clear.alert: Are you sure you want to clear all session messages?
clear.desc: This will clear all session and character data, including session list, character list, session messages, etc.
clear.tip: This action cannot be undone. Once cleared, the data cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
clear.title: Clear All Session Messages

clearCache.alert: Are you sure you want to clear all caches?
clearCache.desc: This will clear the application's downloaded data cache, including character model data, voice data, dance model data, audio data, and more.
clearCache.tip: This action cannot be undone. After clearing, data will need to be re-downloaded. Please proceed with caution.
clearCache.title: Clear Data Cache

reset.alert: Are you sure you want to reset all system settings?
reset.desc: This will reset all system settings, including theme settings, chat settings, language model settings, etc.
reset.tip: This action cannot be undone. Once reset, the data cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
reset.title: Reset System Settings

neutralColor.desc: Customize grayscale for different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

llm.aesGcm: Your key and proxy address will be encrypted using the <1>AES-GCM</1> encryption algorithm.

checker.desc: Test if the API Key and proxy address are filled in correctly.
checker.title: Connectivity Check

customModelCards.confirmDelete: You are about to delete this custom model. Once deleted, it cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.

azureDeployName.extra: The field used for actual requests in Azure OpenAI.
azureDeployName.placeholder: Please enter the model deployment name in Azure.
azureDeployName.title: Model Deployment Name

displayName.placeholder: Please enter the display name of the model, e.g., ChatGPT, GPT-4, etc.
displayName.title: Model Display Name

files.extra: The current file upload implementation is just a hack solution, limited to self-experimentation. Please wait for full file upload capabilities in future implementations.
files.title: File Upload Support

functionCall.extra: This configuration will only enable function calling capabilities in the application. Whether function calling is supported depends entirely on the model itself. Please test the function calling capabilities of the model yourself.
functionCall.title: Function Calling Support

id.extra: This will be displayed as the model label.
id.placeholder: Please enter the model ID, e.g., gpt-4-turbo-preview or claude-2.1.
id.title: Model ID

vision.extra: This configuration will only enable image upload capabilities in the application. Whether recognition is supported depends entirely on the model itself. Please test the visual recognition capabilities of the model yourself.
vision.title: Visual Recognition Support

fetchOnClient.desc: The client request mode will initiate session requests directly from the browser, which can enhance response speed.
fetchOnClient.title: Use Client Request Mode

modelList.desc: Select the models to display in the session; the chosen models will be shown in the model list.
modelList.placeholder: Please select a model from the list
modelList.title: Model List

proxyUrl.desc: Must include http(s)://, in addition to the default address.
proxyUrl.title: API Proxy Address

llm.title: Language Model
llm.waitingForMore: More models are currently <1>being planned for integration</1>, please stay tuned.

customPrompt.desc: Once filled out, the system assistant will use the custom prompt when generating content
customPrompt.title: Custom Prompt

emotionAnalysis.label: Emotion Analysis Model
emotionAnalysis.modelDesc: Specify the model used for emotion analysis
emotionAnalysis.title: Automatic Emotion Analysis

clientCall.desc: When enabled, the voice synthesis service will be called from the client, resulting in faster voice synthesis, but it requires a VPN or the ability to access the internet.
clientCall.title: Client Call
